explains: n. 胶底运动鞋（sneaker 的复数形式）

sentences.en: He wore old jeans and a pair of sneakers.
sentences.cn: 他穿一条旧牛仔裤，脚蹬运动鞋。

sentences.en: She untied the laces on one of her sneakers.
sentences.cn: 她解开了她一只运动鞋的鞋带。

sentences.en: Off came her sneakers and on went a pair of stilettos.
sentences.cn: 她脱下运动鞋，穿上一双细高跟鞋。
